snippet: A gay California teenager who must closet his sexuality at a gathering in Nebraska suddenly finds himself a target of suspicion.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie Take Me to the River, directed by Matt Sobel.
lead_paragraph: A gay California teenager who must closet his sexuality at a gathering in Nebraska suddenly finds himself a target of suspicion.

headline.main: Review: ‘Take Me to the River’ Immerses a Teenager in Scandal at a Family Reunion
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Take Me to the River’ Immerses a Teenager in Scandal at a Family Reunion
